org.h2.mvstore

Class OffHeapStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.h2.mvstore.FileStore
      • org.h2.mvstore.OffHeapStore

  • public class OffHeapStore
extends FileStore
    A storage mechanism that "persists" data in the off-heap area of the main memory.
